text:
Hi Everyone
How do i retreive DND content over the API?
I would recommend using V3 APIs
where do you get this information from? I am looking for the billing term (months), which exists at every line items but I have no idea how to find its API name
<@UD53A9UUR> It still does not seem to be working. Has the patch been released?
looks like it is being deployed now :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U04R20MJQJ1> is a private app required when using this API? In a scenario like blog posts or public HubDB, what's the recommended approach?
The Workflows API doesn’t allow the current workflow actions to be passed in. So has anyone built a custom coded action to act as a “DELAY until Date” action?
wow thanks a lot Jacob!! Even this info saves me a lot, as I can give them a future plan to my client. I appreciate it!

Hi HI HI! Anyone use or have used Boomi for their SFDC/HS integration? I have a client that cant use zapier (or anything like that). Only Boomi :slightly_smiling_face:. Tips or "Do not do its" or documentation you can share to help? I am assisting this custom integration, I am not doing it all on my own (they have internal people doing it but they havent done it before with boomi and sfdc/hs).
